siteMetadata.title: Matthieu Oger
siteMetadata.author: Matthieu Oger
siteMetadata.description: I am a product manager, developer and designer from France. Co-founder of Pixelnest Studio.

markdownRemark.html:
John Moltz:

Microsoft struggles to get developers on its platforms with apps coming late or not at all, developers ship for Apple first and foremost and the platform with the most market share is, ostensibly, open-source.

You couldn’t have written this as science fiction in 1997. No one would have believed it.

excerptQuote.name: John Moltz
excerptQuote.quote: You couldn’t have written this as science fiction in 1997. No one would have believed it.
